title: Work Projects
subtitle: Featuring some of the work I've done so far in my career.
main:
Rev.com
Publications
Earnings-22: A Practical Benchmark for Accents in the Wild - as the paper's first author, I led the effort to gather, transcribe, and demonstrate accent bias in Rev.com's production ASR model. The paper describing our process to create the dataset and perform our bias study has been submitted to Interspeech 2022 and can be found here.

Earnings 21: A Practical Benchmark for ASR in the Wild - as the paper's first author, I led the effort to gather, transcribe, and annotate the dataset. The paper describing our process to create and evaluate the dataset was accepted to Interspeech 2021 and can be found here.

Automatic Spoken Language Identification
This API works by taking in a media file and predicting the most likely language spoken throughout it. For this project, I led the development of the underlying Docker container that runs the prediction. As owner, I was tasked with managing stakeholders, developing best practices for the project, writing tons of scripts, working with the AWS stack (such as ECR and S3), and post-deployment maintainance.
API Documentation
